addNewNode

public PamNode addNewNode(java.lang.String label)
Description copied from interface: PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Convenience method for initializing PerceptualAssociativeMemory before runtime, does not check for duplicates when adding. Creates and adds a new Node to this PerceptualAssociativeMemory with specified label. The new node is returned. Default PamNode type is used. Node is given base-level activation and base-level activation removal threshold based on default of Learnable.

Specified by:
addNewNode in interface PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Parameters:
label - label of new node
Returns:
the new node
See Also:
Learnable

addNewLink

public Link addNewLink(Node source,
                       Linkable sink,
                       LinkCategory type,
                       double activation,
                       double removalThreshold,
                       java.lang.String blExciteStrategy,
                       java.lang.String blDecayStrategy)
Description copied from interface: PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Convenience method for initializing PerceptualAssociativeMemory before runtime, does not check for duplicates. Creates and adds a new default PamLink with specified attributes.

Specified by:
addNewLink in interface PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Parameters:
source - source for link
sink - sink for link
type - category for link
activation - initial activation for link
removalThreshold - amount of base-level activation link must have to remain in this PAM.
blExciteStrategy - ExciteStrategy for base-level activation
blDecayStrategy - DecayStrategy for base-level activation
Returns:
the new PamLink stored in this PAM.

addNewLink

public Link addNewLink(int sourceId,
                       ExtendedId sinkId,
                       LinkCategory type,
                       double activation,
                       double removalThreshold,
                       java.lang.String blExciteStrategy,
                       java.lang.String blDecayStrategy)
Description copied from interface: PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Convenience method for initializing PerceptualAssociativeMemory before runtime, does not check for duplicates. Creates and adds a new default PamLink with specified attributes.

Specified by:
addNewLink in interface PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Parameters:
sourceId - Source's ExtendedId
sinkId - Sink's ExtendedId
type - Link's LinkCategory
activation - initial activation
removalThreshold - amount of base-level activation link must have to remain in PAM.
blExciteStrategy - ExciteStrategy for base-level activation
blDecayStrategy - DecayStrategy for base-level activation
Returns:
the new PamLink stored in this PAM.

addNewNode

public PamNode addNewNode(java.lang.String label,
                          double baseLevelActivation,
                          double baseLevelRemovalThreshold,
                          java.lang.String baseLevelExciteStrat,
                          java.lang.String baseLevelDecayStrat)
Description copied from interface: PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Convenience method for initializing PerceptualAssociativeMemory before runtime, does not check for duplicates when adding. Creates and adds a new Node to this PerceptualAssociativeMemory of specified type, with specified label, base-level activation, and base-level removal threshold New node is returned.

Specified by:
addNewNode in interface PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Parameters:
label - label of new node
baseLevelActivation - initial base-level activation
baseLevelRemovalThreshold - initial base-level removal threshold
baseLevelExciteStrat - ExciteStrategy for base-level activation
baseLevelDecayStrat - DecayStrategy for base-level activation
Returns:
the new PamNode stored in this PAM.

                                   double amount)

addNewLink

public Link addNewLink(Node source,
                       Linkable sink,
                       LinkCategory category)
Description copied from interface: PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Convenience method for initializing PerceptualAssociativeMemory before runtime, does not check for duplicates when adding. Creates and adds a new Link to this PerceptualAssociativeMemory with specified source, sink and category. Default PamLink type is used. The new Link is returned. Node is given base-level activation and base-level activation removal threshold based on default of Learnable.

Specified by:
addNewLink in interface PerceptualAssociativeMemory
Parameters:
source - source for link
sink - sink for link
category - category for link
Returns:
the new Link
See Also:
Learnable
